mapper.sql: INTERFACE_ID, INTERFACE_CODE, INTERFACE_URL, INTERFACE_TYPE,INTERFACE_DETAIL_TYPE, INTERFACE_NAME, ISOFFICAL, INTERFACE_NETWORK, INTERFACE_POTOCOL, INTERFACE_STATUS, USERID, ADDTIME

INTERFACE_ID, INTERFACE_CODE, INTERFACE_URL, (select aaa103 from v_aa10 t where t.aaa100='INTERFACE_TYPE' AND aaa102=INTERFACE_TYPE) INTERFACE_TYPE, (select aaa103 from v_aa10 t where t.aaa100='INTERFACE_TYPE' AND aaa102=INTERFACE_DETAIL_TYPE) INTERFACE_DETAIL_TYPE, INTERFACE_NAME, (select aaa103 from v_aa10 t where t.aaa100='YESNO' AND aaa102=ISOFFICAL) ISOFFICAL, (select aaa103 from v_aa10 t where t.aaa100='INTERFACE_NETWORK' AND aaa102=INTERFACE_NETWORK) INTERFACE_NETWORK, (select aaa103 from v_aa10 t where t.aaa100='INTERFACE_POTOCOL' AND aaa102=INTERFACE_POTOCOL) INTERFACE_POTOCOL, INTERFACE_STATUS, USERID, ADDTIME
mapper.select: select a.INTERFACE_ID, a.INTERFACE_CODE, a.INTERFACE_URL, a.INTERFACE_TYPE, a.INTERFACE_DETAIL_TYPE, a.INTERFACE_NAME, a.ISOFFICAL, a.INTERFACE_NETWORK, a.INTERFACE_POTOCOL, a.INTERFACE_STATUS, a.USERID, a.ADDTIME, b.CHANNEL_ID from SYS_API_INTERFACE a,SYS_API_CHANNEL b,sys_api_channel_interface c where a.interface_id=c.interface_id and b.channel_id=c.channel_id and c.isvalid='1' and a.INTERFACE_STATUS='1' and b.channel_status='1' and regexp_like(#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},a.INTERFACE_URL ) and b.CHANNEL_APPKEY = #{appkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
SELECT sys_guid() from dual
insert into SYS_API_INTERFACE (INTERFACE_ID, INTERFACE_CODE, INTERFACE_URL, INTERFACE_TYPE, INTERFACE_DETAIL_TYPE,INTERFACE_NAME, ISOFFICAL, INTERFACE_NETWORK, INTERFACE_POTOCOL, INTERFACE_STATUS, USERID, ADDTIME) values (#{interfaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceDetailType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isoffical,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceNetwork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfacePotocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '-1', #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate)

SELECT sys_guid() from dual

INTERFACE_ID,
INTERFACE_CODE,
INTERFACE_URL,
INTERFACE_TYPE,
INTERFACE_DETAIL_TYPE,
INTERFACE_NAME,
ISOFFICAL,
INTERFACE_NETWORK,
INTERFACE_POTOCOL,
INTERFACE_STATUS,
USERID,
ADDTIME,

mapper.update:
update SYS_API_INTERFACE
INTERFACE_CODE = #{interfaceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFACE_URL = #{interfaceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFACE_TYPE = #{interfaceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFACE_DETAIL_TYPE = #{interfaceDetailType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFACE_NAME = #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISOFFICAL = #{isoffical,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFACE_NETWORK = #{interfaceNetwork,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFACE_POTOCOL = #{interfacePotocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERFACE_STATUS = #{interfaceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE},
where INTERFACE_ID = #{interfaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SYS_API_INTERFACE set INTERFACE_CODE = #{interfaceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_URL = #{interfaceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_TYPE = #{interfaceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_DETAIL_TYPE = #{interfaceDetailType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_NAME = #{interfaceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISOFFICAL = #{isoffical,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_NETWORK = #{interfaceNetwork,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_POTOCOL = #{interfacePotocol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_STATUS = #{interfaceStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE} where INTERFACE_ID = #{interfaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
